mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count, SUM(CASE WHEN block_start_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS weekly_count FROM block_list
SELECT block_reason, COUNT(*) AS reason_count, ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM block_list), 2) AS percentage FROM block_list GROUP BY block_reason ORDER BY reason_count DESC
